definition: Tongli, a city in Jiangsu Province, China
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Similarly a few years know that we are facing employment problems.
sentences.chinese: 同理可知再过几年我们所面临的就业问题。

sentences.english: Building the harmonious society is the whole human people's common ideal.
sentences.chinese: 构建和谐社会，是当代全人类的共同理想。

sentences.english: Those elements, Meltzoff says, are the roots of empathy.
sentences.chinese: 梅尔佐夫说，这些特质就是同理心的根源。

sentences.english: It's in the same way, just like this, how fog disorients our mind.
sentences.chinese: 同理，就像这样，雾怎么在迷失我们的心灵呢。

sentences.english: Also, you can specify independently the filtering methods for magnification and minification .
sentences.chinese: 同理，你也可以为放大和缩小定义独立的过滤方法。

sentences.english: Doing for the best is the common ideal in the plant.
sentences.chinese: 追求卓越是企业的共同理想。

sentences.english: Traveling gives also understanding and can create empathy, which is a virtue.
sentences.chinese: 旅行可以开阔眼界，让人富有同理心，这才是美德。

sentences.english: The same principal causes pointed high-heeled shoes to sink into a soft surface more easily than flat shoes.
sentences.chinese: 同理，尖高跟鞋比平跟鞋更易陷入表面柔软的物体。

sentences.english: The same goes for activities such as running and swimming.
sentences.chinese: 同理可证，跑步和游泳也是一样。

sentences.english: This is the same as a root with a minor third and a diminished fifth added above it.
sentences.chinese: 同理，根音加小三度，其上加一个减五度。

sentences.english: In a way, business is one big bet.
sentences.chinese: 同理，商业也是一个大赌注。

sentences.english: Just like it wasn't a crazy thing to say if we only had the guy in Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 同理，如果只有这个密西根家伙，那么也不算疯狂。

sentences.english: Likewise, common interests appear to be a significant factor in selecting friends.
sentences.chinese: 同理，共同的兴趣似乎是择友的一个重要因素。

sentences.english: This is the same as a root with a minor third and a perfect fifth added above it.
sentences.chinese: 同理，加小三度的根音，其上加一个纯五度。

sentences.english: In the same way, I write at least simple installations before those tests.
sentences.chinese: 同理，我会在那些测试之前至少编写一些简单的安装。

sentences.english: An environmentalist who is not a gastronome is boring.
sentences.chinese: 同理，不热爱美食的环境专家也成不了一个好美食家。
